text: Ek Tera Saath () is a 2016 Indian horror film.‘Ek Tera Saath’ launches its first motion poster The film is directed by Arshad Siddiqui starring Sharad Malhotra, Hritu Dudani and Melanie Nazareth in lead roles and was released on 21 October 2016. Ek Tera Saath is a romantic film with a bit of supernatural element. It has been shot in Ghanerao, Jaisalmer, Jodhpur, Delhi, Chandigarh, Shimla and Mumbai. The trailer and its songs were released on 16 September 2016. == Cast == * Sharad Malhotra as Kuwar Aditya Pratap Singh * Hritu Dudani as Kusturi/ Nikita * Melanie Nazareth as Sonali * Vishwajeet Pradhan * Deepraj Rana * Gargi Patel * Aprajita Mahajan * Anubhav Dhir == Music == The music is composed by Sunil Singh, Liyakat Ajmeri & Ali -Anirudh. The Music Of Ek Tera Saath was released on 16 September 2016 by Zee Music on YouTube. The songs are sung by Rahat Fateh Ali Khan & K.K. == Crew == * Director – Arshad Siddiqui * Cinematographer – Ravi Bhatt * Associated Director – Tanveer Alam ==References== Category:2010s Hindi-language films Category:Indian films Category:Indian horror films
title: Ek Tera Saath
